tool_description: Dependency is the notion that linguistic units, e.g. words, are connected to each other by directed links.
name: Dependency grammar
title: Dependency grammar

api_list.name: dep
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dependency-grammar.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/dep"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dependency-grammar.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
